app.title: Trumpet Practice
app.description: This is a tool to help you practice trumpet intonation:

instructions.start: Click the Start button to begin practice
instructions.target: The interface will display a target note
instructions.play: Try to play the corresponding note
instructions.feedback: When the pitch is correct, you'll see 'Correct!' feedback
instructions.autoNext: After 2 seconds, a new target note will be selected automatically
instructions.continue: Continue practicing or click the Stop button to end
